name: Suryadi Zhang
title: Software Engineer (Full-Stack) · React & Python
tagline: Next.js, FastAPI, Postgres · Shipped live booking + admin · CI/CD

about.summary: Full-Stack Software Engineer delivering responsive web apps and robust APIs with React/Next.js, Python/FastAPI, and Postgres. I turn ambiguous requirements into production-ready systems that ship continuously with CI/CD.
howIWork: Model data and design REST APIs with auth, pagination, and clear errors, documented with OpenAPI
Build responsive React/Next.js UIs that perform well on mobile and are accessible by default
Add guardrails with validation (Pydantic/Zod), rate limiting, logging/metrics, and automated tests
Ship safely with GitHub Actions (lint, unit/integration tests, preview deploys)
impact: Shipped a live booking platform + admin (Next.js/TypeScript + FastAPI/Postgres) deployed on Vercel + VPS → enabled role-based access, secure auth, rate limiting, and automated deployments
Increased deployment frequency by ~30% by introducing CI/CD pipelines → fewer regressions and faster delivery
Reduced setup time by ~15% in event operations with SOPs and automation → applied same discipline in engineering
whatIBuild: Well-documented APIs with strong auth and predictable error models
Admin dashboards that reduce manual work
CI/CD pipelines for confident daily releases

bullets: Shipped Next.js/Tailwind frontend (Vercel) + FastAPI/Postgres backend (VPS) for live booking + admin → 100% self-serve bookings
Implemented rate limiting, caching, schema validation → reduced user-visible errors by ~25%
Automated CI/CD with GitHub Actions → cut release time by ~40% and enabled daily deployments
Structured repos, environments, and PR checks → onboarded contributors smoothly
Built user-facing features in Next.js/React + FastAPI/Flask → improved responsiveness and reduced page load ~20%
Authored REST endpoints with validation & OpenAPI → clearer integration and faster onboarding
Added CI pipelines with Postgres service → improved merge reliability by ~35%
Delivered a capstone app (auth + CRUD + responsive UI) with documented setup
Coordinated 100+ events; created SOPs reducing setup errors by ~15%
Mentored 10+ staff; honed leadership, communication, and teamwork

education.notes: Certificate of Completion; capstone booking platform with role-based access, secure auth, CI/CD
Coursework in Micro/Macroeconomics and Statistics; foundations for data analysis
